channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Chipotle is 're-emphasizing generous portions' after social-media complaints
item.description: Chipotle's CEO tells investors that the chain had not shrunk its portions despite accusations on Tiktok and Reddit. Brian Niccol has tried to bat down those complaints for weeks.
item.content:encoded:
Chipotle's CEO tells investors that the chain had not shrunk its portions despite accusations on Tiktok and Reddit. Brian Niccol has tried to bat down those complaints for weeks.

(Image credit: Brandon Bell/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Alina Selyukh

item.title: Researchers have found a protein that seems to protect brain cells from Alzheimer's
item.description: A study of 48 post-mortem brains found a protein that appears to protect brain cells from Alzheimer's — even in people who had significant amounts of amyloid plaques in their brains.
item.content:encoded: A study of 48 post-mortem brains found a protein that appears to protect brain cells from Alzheimer's — even in people who had significant amounts of amyloid plaques in their brains.
item.dc:creator: Jon Hamilton

item.title: Thousands of protesters marched in D.C. ahead of Netanyahu's speech to Congress
item.description: Thousands of protesters marched near the U.S. Capitol to protest against the war in Gaza, as Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu addressed Congress.
item.content:encoded: Thousands of protesters marched near the U.S. Capitol to protest against the war in Gaza, as Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu addressed Congress.
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Ludden

item.title: NBA signs media rights deal with Disney, NBC and Amazon, leaving TNT behind
item.description: The NBA signed its 11-year media rights deal with Disney, NBC and Amazon Prime Video after saying it was not accepting Warner Bros. Discovery’s offer to continue its longtime relationship with the league.
item.content:encoded:
The NBA signed its 11-year media rights deal with Disney, NBC and Amazon Prime Video after saying it was not accepting Warner Bros. Discovery’s offer to continue its longtime relationship with the league.

(Image credit: Jason DeCrow)

item.title: California's newest state park is like a time machine
item.description: In the Central Valley, California’s first new state park in a decade opened this summer and it re-imagines what a state park can be.
item.content:encoded: In the Central Valley, California’s first new state park in a decade opened this summer and it re-imagines what a state park can be.
item.dc:creator: Jonaki Mehta

item.title: How Gen-Z is feeling about Kamala Harris at the top of the ticket
item.description: President Biden has struggled with young voters. But now that he's out and Vice President Harris is in, younger voters are re-calculating.
item.content:encoded: President Biden has struggled with young voters. But now that he's out and Vice President Harris is in, younger voters are re-calculating.
item.dc:creator: Elena Moore

item.title: Netanyahu met with standing ovation and protest over joint meeting of Congress
item.description: Israel’s Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is meeting this week separately with President Biden and Vice President Harris. Wednesday afternoon, he addressed a joint meeting of Congress.
item.content:encoded: Israel’s Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is meeting this week separately with President Biden and Vice President Harris. Wednesday afternoon, he addressed a joint meeting of Congress.
item.dc:creator: Barbara Sprunt

item.title: A cold front is bringing some relief to the Northwest — but also wind
item.description: The Northwest has been suffering record-setting heat. A cold front is supposed to move in, but with it comes high winds and dry thunderstorms in forests that have been cooked tinder dry.
item.content:encoded: The Northwest has been suffering record-setting heat. A cold front is supposed to move in, but with it comes high winds and dry thunderstorms in forests that have been cooked tinder dry.
item.dc:creator: Kirk Siegler

item.title: Tennis player Coco Gauff is named as USA flag bearer for Olympics
item.description: Coco Gauff the 23-year-old tennis player seemed floored today when she learned she'll be the first tennis player to have the honor of being flag bearer for the American team at the Paris Olympics.
item.content:encoded: Coco Gauff the 23-year-old tennis player seemed floored today when she learned she'll be the first tennis player to have the honor of being flag bearer for the American team at the Paris Olympics.
item.dc:creator: Gus Contreras

item.title: World No. 1 tennis player Jannik Sinner to sit out Paris Olympics due to illness
item.description: The tennis star said he was advised by a doctor to sit out the Paris tournament after getting the diagnosis.
item.content:encoded:
The tennis star said he was advised by a doctor to sit out the Paris tournament after getting the diagnosis.

(Image credit: Mosa'ab Elshamy)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman
